availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William P. Poore (Mississippi County, Missouri, physician)

body.p: Mississippi County, Missouri, physician. Tennessee native. Physician in Mississippi County, Missouri, in 1860. Resident of Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1863. Enslaved at least one person, Peter, in Hickman County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Missouri, Mississippi County, Tywappity, p. 511.
KYR-0001-029-0310.
KYR-0001-029-0308.
